trigger.expression: {Template Generic UPS SNMPv2:mib-2.33.1.4.4.1.2.1.avg(5m)}<198 or {Template Generic UPS SNMPv2:mib-2.33.1.4.4.1.2.1.avg(5m)}>236
trigger.recovery_expression: {Template Generic UPS SNMPv2:mib-2.33.1.4.4.1.2.1.avg(5m)}>=198 and {Template Generic UPS SNMPv2:mib-2.33.1.4.4.1.2.1.avg(5m)}<=236
trigger.name: Abnormal UPS Output Voltage
trigger.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1} Abnormal UPS Output Voltage

trigger.expression: {Template Generic UPS SNMPv2:mib-2.33.1.3.3.1.3.1.avg(5m)}<198 or {Template Generic UPS SNMPv2:mib-2.33.1.3.3.1.3.1.avg(5m)}>236
trigger.recovery_expression: {Template Generic UPS SNMPv2:mib-2.33.1.3.3.1.3.1.avg(5m)}>=198 and {Template Generic UPS SNMPv2:mib-2.33.1.3.3.1.3.1.avg(5m)}<=236
trigger.name: Abnormal Utility Line Voltage
trigger.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1} Abnormal Utility Line Voltage

trigger.name: Utility Line Unavailable
trigger.description: Utility Line Unavailable, UPS is on battery mode.
